DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study determine whether antidepressant effect signal transduction peripheral lymphocyte determine whether signal difference drug responder nonresponders predict antidepressant response represent clinical status depress patient .
DOC.criteria: 1. meet Diagnostic Statistical Manual American Psychiatric Association ( DSMIV ) criteria MDD Department Psychiatry , Sungkyunkwan University , Seoul , South Korea . 2. 18 year age old , existence unipolar major depressive episode verify DSMIII/IV criterion , least 2 year first episode onset , agreement inform consent pregnancy significant medical condition abnormal laboratory baseline value unstable psychiatric feature ( e.g , suicidal attempt ) history alcohol drug dependence , seizure , neurological illness , concomitant Axis I psychiatric disorder
